projects.name: Inflatables Demo
projects.description: A multiplayer physics game where players control characters made of inflatable primitive shapes
technicalDetails: Built a fully physics-based character controller with realistic movement, eliminating reliance on animations.
Minimized network traffic and latency using deterministic physics and joint-based character rigs.
Optimized performance for low-end devices with primitive meshes and efficient architecture.
Created all custom assets in Blender after rapid self-training.

projects.name: Cool Maze Game
projects.description: A multiplayer maze race with funky vector graphics and psychedelic effects
technicalDetails: Designed a procedural maze system with two meshes and one material, achieving a minimalist vector-style aesthetic
Implemented peer-to-peer multiplayer with zero server cost using Unity's Distributed Authority
Optimized code using Singletons and efficient algorithms for real-time maze generation and pathfinding
Developed custom shaders and original music through self-directed learning
